text: [Music]
hello i'm mohanna a cloud support
engineer here at the aws office in
dallas today i'm going to show you how
to change the time zone for an amazon
aurora db cluster let's get started
in amazon aurora the clusters are
created with the default time zone of
utc to modify the time zone value on the
aurora cluster you must modify the
parameter time zone at the cluster level
parameter group
after this parameter is modified at the
cluster level the change is applied to
all nodes in the cluster
to modify the cluster level parameter on
the aurora cluster the parameter group
must be a custom parameter group
to create a custom cluster parameter
group after logging into the aws
management console navigate to the
amazon relational database service
console
then select parameter groups
to create a new cluster parameter group
select create parameter group
select the parameter group family we'll
be creating the cluster parameter group
for an amazon aurora mysql 5.7
compatible cluster
select the type as db cluster parameter
group
enter a parameter group name and
description
after you create the custom parameter
group
select it and then choose edit
parameters
in this example we'll modify the time
zone from the default value of u2c to
asia calcutta search for the parameter
time zone select the time zone asia
calcutta
and then select save changes
now that we have our custom parameter
groups ready let's return to the cluster
page
select modify scroll down and then from
the drop down menu select the new
parameter group and then choose continue
when you associate a new parameter group
for the first time the writer instance
must be rebooted for the new values to
be effective this means that you can
choose to apply the modification
immediately or during your scheduled
maintenance window
note that this parameter is dynamic
which means that further modifications
of this parameter don't require a reboot
of the instance
now let's connect to the aurora db
cluster to check the modified value of
the time zone after connecting run this
command to verify the change in the time
zone setting
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
[Music]
you
